derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from French télécommunication, from télé- 'at a distance' + communication 'communication'

means.word_mean: 1. (often plural) systems used in transmitting messages over a distance electronically
2. (often plural) the branch of electrical engineering concerned with the technology of electronic communication at a distance
